inputs.question: What do people aim to do at work? A: complete job, B: learn from each other, C: kill animals, D: wear hats, E: talk to each other
inputs.reasoning: People generally go to work to accomplish their tasks and responsibilities, i.e., to complete their job; the other options are not primary aims of work.
